message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the chance to purchase my product for $11,500. I believe this product would be highly valuable to you, and this price reflects its worth.

I appreciate your time, Alice. I'm willing to consider purchasing the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,500. I'm trying to stay within a budget, and I believe this price would be more in line with my financial constraints.
Bob, I understand your budget concerns. How about we meet in the middle at $11,000? This price reflects the value of the product while acknowledging your initial offer.

I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, Alice. However, I'm still a bit short on budget. I'd be willing to go up to $10,750. I think this price is a fair compromise that works for both of us.
